title: What Champ Should I main
body: Can u watch my replays and tell me wat champ for me I've tried all lot of champions but only some like Leblanc {{champion:7}} and sona {{champion:37}} are fun. Pleas help me with wat lane and champ I should main. and by the way my summoner names are H0n0urMeH0n0urU2 and Your Cousi

replies.body: You're only level 11, don't worry about finding someone to main yet. Keep trying champions, make the most of the free rotations, you'll find something you like.
Yeah this. Keep playing different champions and just learn all the ins and outs of each character and learn your fav champs str's and weaknesses to those champs.

which lane are you most comfortable with? for me, mid is my favorite lane i main {{champion:99}}  and {{champion:84}} . if you like {{champion:37}} , try support lane and try champs like {{champion:267}} . if you like {{champion:7}} , u should go for midlane and try other fun champs like {{champion:105}} .

maining support makes you the greatest type of person in the game. all of your game queues will be under 30 minutes and its the least effort required. most of the time if your team blames you it can somehow be diverted to the ADCs fault
I'll try out some new champs and hope I find someone I like
